lead_paragraph: Newly hired outside engineers have been given a month to find Flint’s underground lead water pipes, Gov. Rick Snyder of Michigan said Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Michigan: Search Is On for Flint’s Lead Water Pipes
headline.main: Michigan: Search Is On for Flint’s Lead Water Pipes

snippet: Newly hired outside engineers have been given a month to find Flint’s underground lead water pipes, Gov. Rick Snyder of Michigan said Wednesday.
abstract: Michigan Gov Rick Snyder says outside engineers have been tasked with finding and replacing lead water pipes in Flint; facing pressure from Flint's mayor and civil rights groups, Snyder says his ultimate goal is to replace pipes without disruption to other services.
